Type.Name: TextPoppedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public sealed delegate void TextPoppedHandler (object o, GtkSharp.TextPoppedArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: An event that is fired when messages are popped from the message stack of a .

remarks.para: This event passes data to its handlers with the class.
